full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN SGROL MA LA BRTEN NAS BU'I GA-YANG 'GUGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): AEL LA GOG SANG HU THOG THU MER GEN PAndI TA,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES RJE BTZUN SGROL MA LA BRTEN NAS BU'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYA TSUL RIN PO CHE LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DZA HA CHEN GUNG THOG THU BA THUS DNGUL MAndAL KHA BTAGS DANG BCAS PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BU 'DOD PA NI BU THOB GYUR ZHING, ,ZHES GZHUNG YOD @010B PA'I PHYIR, AEL LA GOG SANG HU THOG THU MER GEN PAndI TAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI NOM CHI THO'ING KU SHRI SLOB DPON BLO BZANG RGYAL MCHOG PO'I, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, 'GRO BA RNAMS KYIS GNAS SKABS SU DGOS 'DOD 'GRUB CING MTHUR THUG SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SKYES TSE BYIS PA'I MGO BOR BTAGS, ,BGEGS LEGS PAR BSKRAD MNGA' GZHU DANG, MA PHUR KHANG LTAR MTHONG MTHONG NAS GNOD MA BYED THE TSOM MED, ,DGE'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
